data.approach: Investigating yolo session launch bug. The error logs show ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED, but need to verify the endpoint works when server is running. Checking terminal spawning logic on macOS.

summary: Identified connection issues preventing YOLO session launch
Traced failed API and WebSocket connection attempts to localhost:3333
Investigated console errors related to session initialization

quality.preExisting: Connection layer appears to have underlying configuration problems

suggestedTasks.title: Diagnose and Resolve Localhost API Connection Failures
suggestedTasks.description: Investigate why localhost:3333 API endpoints are refusing connections during session launch. Check network configuration, server startup process, and potential port blocking. Review webpack/vite configuration, ensure dev server is correctly configured and running.
suggestedTasks.reason: Multiple API endpoints failing to connect, blocking core functionality

suggestedTasks.title: Add Robust Error Handling for Network Connection Failures
suggestedTasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling in network fetch mechanisms. Add graceful fallback strategies, improved user-facing error messages, and logging for connection issues. Focus on files: fetcher.js, websocket.svelte.ts, and related network interaction modules.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks meaningful error feedback

patterns: WebSocket reconnection strategy with exponential backoff
gotchas: Connection failures silently block user interactions
No clear error messaging for network issues

documentationNeeds: Update troubleshooting guide for local development connection issues
Document expected network configuration for session launch
